issue.title: [C++] Expose an equality API for arrays that compares a range of slots on two arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-206](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-206). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need this type of thing to compare equality of structs/unions if we want to avoid allocating new arrays when comparing structs when the array has at least one null element.
